name: Yggdrasil (C0mmando_Sc0rpia)
description:
A game made for Global Game Jam 2023 for the theme 'Roots'.

You are a Viking exploring the surrounding lands connected together by the roots of world tree Yggdrasil. But if you die, a descendant of yours with slightly different stats will embark on the same quest as their ancestor in an attempt to reconnect with their familial roots, and you play as them instead. 

Made by Artur, Ben, Charlie, Sam.
